sentences.en: Increased professionalism has changed the game radically.
sentences.cn: 职业运动员日益增加，彻底改变了这项运动。

sentences.en: The landscape has been radically altered, severely damaging wildlife.
sentences.cn: 地貌彻底改变，严重损害了野生动物。

sentences.en: However, it was another interest that led Leah to radically reinvent herself.
sentences.cn: 然而，正是另一个兴趣让莉娅彻底地改造了自己。
